com.mycompany.a1

Class Movable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.a1.GameObject
      • com.mycompany.a1.Movable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ant, Spider

    public abstract class Movable
extends GameObject
    This will allow any of the concrete classes move within the game world
    Author:
    Alexander Alestra

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movable

        public Movable(int color,
               int size,
               int speed,
               int heading)
        This method will set the color, size, speed, and heading for a given object
        Parameters:
        color - is the rgb value of a movable object
        size - is the size of the movable object
        speed - is the distance traveled in one tick
        heading - is the direction the object is heading

    • Method Detail

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the speed of the object
        Parameters:
        speed - is the amount of distance can be crossed in one tick

      • getSpeed

        This will get the speed of the current object
        Returns:
        will return the given speed

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(int heading)
        This will set the heading within 360 degrees going clockwise
        Parameters:
        heading - will be set to 360+given heading after deviding the remainder will be left

      • getHeading

        public int getHeading()
        This will retieve the heading from the given object
        Returns:
